summary: Tested revamped Project Management page (/projects/lifecycle). All features working correctly: Dashboard tab with stats, Projects list with pipeline workflow, Budget tracking, Action buttons, View Details modal, Search and Status filter.
critical_code_review_comments: Code is well-structured with proper data-testid attributes for testing
Pipeline workflow correctly shows 6 stages: Need to Start → Ongoing → Completed → Invoiced → Paid → Closed
Budget tracking shows Budget, Expenses, Balance, Profit with proper formatting
Action buttons (View Details, Payment Request, Material Request, Delivery Request) navigate correctly with project_id and pid params
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - used existing projects
context_for_next_testing_agent: Project Management page revamp complete. All features verified: Dashboard stats, Projects list with pipeline, Budget tracking, Action buttons, View Details modal, Search/Filter.

Dashboard tab - Budget Summary (Total Budget, Total Expenses, Budget Utilization)
Dashboard tab - Profit Summary (Total Profit, Margin)
